ORDER OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
615 A.2d 730
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Rudolph WEAVER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 25, 1992.
Decided Nov. 10, 1992.
Thomas Livingston, Miller, Ament & Chaffo (Court-appointed), Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Claire C. Capristo, Deputy Dist. Atty., James R. Gilmore, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPAD AKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
